AboutBride: We seek the comfort of another. Someone to share and share the life we choose. Someone to help us through the neverending attempt to understand ourselves. And in the end, someone to comfort us along the way.
AboutGroom: We seek the comfort of another. Someone to share and share the life we choose. Someone to help us through the neverending attempt to understand ourselves. And in the end, someone to comfort us along the way.
LocationAddress:
Mulund Check Naka 
Lal Bahadur Shastri Marg, Thane West, Mumbai.

Bride.name: Arjun
Bride.details:
A material metaphor is the unifying theory of a rationalized space and a system of motion.The material is grounded in tactile reality, inspired by the study of paper and ink, yettechnologically advanced and open to imagination and magic.
use of familiar tactile attributes helps users quickly understand affordances. Yet the flexibility of the material creates new affordances that supercede those in the physicalworld, without breaking the rules of physics.
